channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: Are tickets on sale for Halloween Horror Nights 2025? Prices, dates
item.description: While it's still technically summer, the pull of spooky season is slowly creeping up atFlorida's theme parks.

item.title: 'Love Island' is back in the fall with another spinoff: What we know
item.description: After a long, dramatic, 36-episode season, filled with love triangles, breakups and make-ups, the“Love Island USA” season seven winners were crownedthis weekend.

item.title: 'Golden' cast joins 'Bachelor in Paradise' after dramatic rose ceremony
item.description: Bachelor Nation is buzzing with opinions about thetenth season of "Bachelor in Paradise,"which premiered last week to much less online fanfare than is typical for the franchise.

item.title: Florida football coach confident in maturity of roster heading into 2025 season

item.title: Rule changes by Florida education officials draw First…
item.description: Florida's State Board of Educationvoted to reduce competency requirements for educational media specialists, who manage library books in schools – and who some say are defenders of students'First Amendment rights.

item.title: Football Recruiting 2026: Florida high school summer…
Elon Musk wants to start a third US political party…
item.description: Question:Tech billionaire and former Trump Administration official Elon Musk has promised to fund his own “America Party”instead of President Donald Trump’s Republican Party. But can athird political partysucceed in the United States?

item.title: Sheriff Hoffman deserves support for keeping Sarasota County safe
item.description: I read the July 13 guest column – titled "Sarasota County loves to spend our money. It's time to draw the line." – by Martin Hyde. He made some important points regarding fiscal responsibility.

item.title: Less than an inch of rain forecast for Sarasota Manatee as invest
item.description: Invest 93Lcontinued Wednesday morning on its path across Florida, but its expected impacts on the Sarasota, Manatee area for the next two days appear limited.
